metadata.dc:description: A leishmanioasis outbreak is reported among the inhabitants of an endemic area for this disease located in Cancha Larga, Chaco in Argentina. Frotis and biopsy confirmed that 11.8% of the whole population was affected. They were all treated with meglumine antimonate.
metadata.dc:title: Brote de leishmaniosis en Cancha Larga, Chaco, Argentina.
[Leishmaniasis outbreak in Cancha Larga, Chaco, Argentina].
